mapper.insert: insert into mate(mateTitle, mateCampsite, lowestAge, highestAge, mateContent, mateCampstyle, mateCampstart, mateCampend, userNo, regDt, fileId, fileName, fileSize, fileContentType, fileUrl ) values(#{mateTitle}, #{mateCampsite}, #{lowestAge}, #{highestAge}, #{mateContent}, #{mateCampstyle}, #{mateCampstart}, #{mateCampend}, #{userNo}, now(), #{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileUrl} )
mapper.select: select mateNo, mateTitle, mateCampsite, lowestAge, highestAge, mateContent, mateCampstyle, mateCampstart, mateCampend, userNo, regDt, fileId, fileName, fileSize, fileContentType, fileUrl from mate order by mateNo desc;
select fileUrl from mate where mateNo = #{mateNo}
